attributes.action: Allow public scrutiny of any social security or housing benefit claims which total an amount which is above the threshold where income tax is payable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where a benefits claimant has a total claim value which is in excess of the minimum level of income tax (inclusive of housing), then the financial circumstances of that claimant should be available to public scrutiny excluding any information precluded via Data Protection Laws.
